About the Company: Infomedia Press Ltd is a printing and publishing company with a leading market presence in diverse business areas spanning Business Directories, Magazine Publishing, Printing Services and Publishing Outsourcing. The company specializes in Designing and Printing of Annual Reports, Magazines, Books, Product brochures, Publicity material, Diaries and Calendars.They have also successfully forayed into the Publishing Outsourcing segment. Infomedia`s publishing activities are focused at two broad categories - Special Interest Consumer Publishing and Business-to-business (B2B) / Trade publishing. .The company also in the business activities of Printing.
